taskbody.context: You can restrict the online help to only search in Triple'A Plus Design Studio User Guide, by setting the Search scope. The following assumes the Online Help is opened.

step.cmd: Click on Search scope next to the Search box.
step.stepresult: The Select Search Scope dialog is displayed.

step.cmd: Mark the radio button Search only the following topics

step.stepresult: The New Search List dialog is displayed.

step.cmd: In the List name text field, type DS.
Check Triple'A Plus Design Studio User Guide box.
Click OK in the New Search List dialog.
Click OK in the Select Search Scope dialog.
